Download Game!

[Introduction]
A fast paced First Person Shooter. Classic FPS game Wolfenstein3D like first pernson shooting game.
Remake of Wolf5K in Flash.
Eliminate all enemies in the level to go to next level.
This game has infinite number of levels.

[Controls]
Mouse Move: Move
W/up: move forward
S/down: move back
Q/left: turn left
E/right: turn right
A/Z: strafe left
D/X: strafe right
----------
Space/Right Click: shoot
Enter: pause game/view game status
M: show/hide map
----------

[About]
Developer: Bruce
Links: http://bruce-lab.blogspot.com/2012/06/source-code-of-game-wolf5k-flash.html
